PresentationTable.name: Time Series
PresentationTable.Description: -> This folder contains several Period-To-Date and Period-Ago metrics based on Revenue fact.

PresentationColumn.name: Period Ago Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the period Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return Day Ago, if month then month ago...

PresentationColumn.name: Revenue Variation to Last Period
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the variation between current period and period Ago Revenu. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return variation to Day Ago, if month then variation to month ago...

PresentationColumn.name: Revenue Pct Var. to Last Period
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the percentage variation between current period and period Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return variation to Day Ago, if month then variation to month ago...

PresentationColumn.name: Trailing 3 Periods Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the sum of current period plus 2 past Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return trailing 3 Days, if month then trailing 3 months...

PresentationColumn.name: Month Ago Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the Month Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of month ago.

PresentationColumn.name: Quarter Ago Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the Quarter Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of Quarter ago.

PresentationColumn.name: Year Ago Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the Year Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of Year ago.

PresentationColumn.name: Quarter to Date Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Shows the Quarter to date sum of Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain.
